body:
OS: Debian bullseye

My bitcoin.conf:
```
addnode=4hllr6w55mbtemb3ebvlzl4zj6qke4si7zcob5qdyg63mjgq624a.b32.i2p:0
addnode=6s33jtpvwzkiej3nff5qm72slgqljxhxn62hdt6m7nvynqsxqdda.b32.i2p:0
addnode=a5qsnv3maw77mlmmzlcglu6twje6ttctd3fhpbfwcbpmewx6fczq.b32.i2p:0
addnode=bitcornrd36coazsbzsz4pdebyzvaplmsalq4kpoljmn6cg6x5zq.b32.i2p:0
addnode=c4gfnttsuwqomiygupdqqqyy5y5emnk5c73hrfvatri67prd7vyq.b32.i2p:0
addnode=dhtq2p76tyhi442aidb3vd2bv7yxxjuddpb2jydnnrl2ons5bhha.b32.i2p:0
addnode=gehtac45oaghz54ypyopim64mql7oad2bqclla74l6tfeolzmodq.b32.i2p:0
addnode=h3r6bkn46qxftwja53pxiykntegfyfjqtnzbm6iv6r5mungmqgmq.b32.i2p:0
addnode=hnbbyjpxx54623l555sta7pocy3se4sdgmuebi5k6reesz5rjp6q.b32.i2p:0
addnode=i3hcdakiz2tyvggkwefvdjoi7444kgvd2mbdfizjvv43q7zukezq.b32.i2p:0
addnode=jz3s4eurm5vzjresf4mwo7oni4bk36daolwxh4iqtewakylgkxmq.b32.i2p:0
addnode=kokkmpquqlkptu5hkmzqlttsmtwxicldr4so7wqsufk6bwf32nma.b32.i2p:0
addnode=kvrde7mcgjhz3xzeltwy4gs2rxdfbnbs2wc67mh2pt43wjmjnmbq.b32.i2p:0
addnode=shh2ewyegnuwnmdse5kl5toybdvzkvk2yj4zcowz6iwhhh3ykdfa.b32.i2p:0
addnode=wwbw7nqr3ahkqv62cuqfwgtneekvvpnuc4i4f6yo7tpoqjswvcwa.b32.i2p:0
addnode=zsxwyo6qcn3chqzwxnseusqgsnuw3maqnztkiypyfxtya4snkoka.b32.i2p:0
i2psam=127.0.0.1:7656
i2pacceptincoming=1
debug=i2p
```
After bitcoind restart, it can't connect to any i2p peers, the following messages noticed in the bitcoind output:
```
2021-09-17T16:38:26Z I2P: Error connecting to a5qsnv3maw77mlmmzlcglu6twje6ttctd3fhpbfwcbpmewx6fczq.b32.i2p:0: "STREAM STATUS RESULT=CANT_REACH_PEER MESSAGE="Connection timed out""
...
2021-09-17T16:39:48Z I2P: Error connecting to dhtq2p76tyhi442aidb3vd2bv7yxxjuddpb2jydnnrl2ons5bhha.b32.i2p:0: "STREAM STATUS RESULT=CANT_REACH_PEER MESSAGE="Connection timed out""
...
2021-09-17T16:42:10Z I2P: Error connecting to shh2ewyegnuwnmdse5kl5toybdvzkvk2yj4zcowz6iwhhh3ykdfa.b32.i2p:0: Unexpected reply to "NAMING LOOKUP NAME=shh2ewyegnuwnmdse5kl5toybdvzkvk2yj4zcowz6iwhhh3ykdfa.b32.i2p": "NAMING REPLY RESULT=KEY_NOT_FOUND NAME=shh2ewyegnuwnmdse5kl5toybdvzkvk2yj4zcowz6iwhhh3ykdfa.b32.i2p"
```
'bitcoin-cli -netinfo 4' showing no i2p peers.

After another restart, bitcoind connects to i2p peers and I see them in 'bitcoin-cli -netinfo 4' output. However, I don't see any i2p inbound connections.
```
        ipv4    ipv6   onion     i2p   total   block  manual
in        12       0       0       0      12
out       10       0       0       8      18       2       8
total     22       0       0       8      30

```

My node is behind the NAT. I've forwarded 8333 port and TCP/UDP I2P port.
Is there anything else I should do to see incoming i2p peers?
title: I2P: connection issues
